entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 7:23 PM NDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:23 PM NDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
